QueryDefinition.Query:
SELECT distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, d.hvid, d.proc_dt, d.proc_cd, d.proc_unit_qty, d.hv_enc_id,
e.enc_grp_txt, e.los_day_cnt, e.bill_typ_std_cd, case when enc_grp_txt LIKE '%ENCOUNTER_VISIT_TYPE: Inpatient%' and los_day_cnt > 1 then 9201 else 9202 end defaultConceptId FROM {sc}.cdm_enc_dtl d JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE JOIN {sc}.cdm_enc e ON d.hvid = e.hvid and d.hv_enc_id = e.hv_enc_id where d.proc_dt is not null order by ch.person_id
